name: Miro #3
description:
10 NFT series
3277 x 4096 px

Utility Function: Collectors that possess a “Miro” NFT will have all the qualities of an exemplary school teacher.

These attributes include:

Ability to communicate complex concepts and ideas to kids that still don’t know where babies come from.

Have patience with children that laugh hysterically whenever their classmates make fart noises. 

Give empathy to toddlers that are acting out because they would much rather be outside playing fun games instead of learning boring math formulas that they will undoubtedly forget as soon as they graduate.

Please Direct Message me on Twitter @Microgemanisms after purchase!
